mapper.insert: insert into order_xianwan (id, adid, adname, appid, ordernum, dlevel, pagename, atype, deviceid, simid, appsign, merid, event, adicon, price, money, itime, keycode,created_time) values (#{params.id},#{params.adid},#{params.adname},#{params.appid},#{params.ordernum},#{params.dlevel},#{params.pagename},#{params.atype},#{params.deviceid},#{params.simid},#{params.appsign},#{params.merid},#{params.event},#{params.adicon},#{params.price},#{params.money},#{params.itime},#{params.keycode},#{params.createdTime})
mapper.select: select ifnull(count(ordernum),0) from order_xianwan where ordernum = #{orderNum}
